Others: Northern Ireland failed to make their chances pay as they were held to a frustrating 0-0 Nations League draw by Belarus in Zalaegerszeg, Hungary.
Conor Bradley was given the Northern Ireland captain’s armband.
Belarus – playing behind closed doors due to UEFA restrictions after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine – made it seven clean sheets in their last nine competitive games.
Pierce Charles enjoyed a quiet night on his debut, with he and midfielder Shea becoming the 23rd set of brothers to play for Northern Ireland or Ireland.
